[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@gnaudio/jabra-js](./jabra-js.md) &gt; [ISingleInitialState](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.md) &gt; [callActive](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.callactive.md)

## ISingleInitialState.callActive property

Set to `true` to set device into a in-call state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callActive: boolean;
```

## Remarks

If set to false, the subsequent argument for [ISingleInitialState.muted](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.muted.md) will be ignored (setting mute state on an idle device is not supported).
